img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Virtual Spirit Week for Grades 4-8 on Facebook

a.title: Virtual Spirit Week for Grades 4-8 on Facebook

div.a: Virtual Spirit Week for Grades 4-8 on Facebook
div.div: April 20th-25th is Virtual Spirit Week for students in grades K-3. Have your parents send us your pictures in Facebook Messenger and we will post as many as we can each day!
div.a: Read More about Virtual Spirit Week for Grades 4-8 on Facebook

div.noscript: Enable Javascript in your browser to view this content.

div.div: Delhi Charter School adheres to the equal opportunity provisions of federal civil rights law and regulations that are applicable to this agency. Therefore, no one will be discriminated against on the basis of race, color, national origin (Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964); gender (Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972); disability (Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973) in attaining educational goals and objectives and in the administration of personnel policies and procedures.
